name: Fruity! (Mobile Friendly)
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

•Movement: A,D or left,right arrow Jump by pressing W,

[SPACE] or up arrow (On mobile press anywhere to move and jump )

•Fruits: Collect them to Unlock New Special Characters!

theres Also a GOLDEN apple which gives you 3 fruits!

Have Fun! :>

•Smash Evil Plants Collect Fruits And Unlock 10+ Special Characters!
